CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 7, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "Notables at Soho Celebration - On Program - Outstanding speakers from all walks of life were among those heard on the Soho Community Association's Independence Day program here Wednesday. On the program were Wac Pvt. Hazel Roberts, Lieut. Charles B. Hall, Capt. William R. Thompson, Mollie Johnson, soprano; David Lawrence, candidate for Mayor, and Prothonotary David B. Roberts.  Senator Joseph M. Guffey and Judge A. Marshall Thompson can be seen in second row. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Pvt. Hazel Roberts, Lieut. Charles B. Hall, Capt. William R. Thompson, Mollie Johnson, David Lawrence, David B. Roberts, and Senator Joseph Guffey and Judge A. Marshall Thompson in back row, posed on platform of Fifth Ward Honor Roll and A. Leo Weil School, for fourth of July celebration by Soho Community Association, Centre Avenue, Hill District
